Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_piece
    This class stands for a single piece

    Candelaresi

        public Piece(char[] c)

    • Method Detail

      • checkAndCreate

        static Piece checkAndCreate(java.lang.String pieceDescription,
                            boolean asteriskAccepted)
                     throws PieceConfigurationException
        Tries to create a new piece after some checks have been made. We've made it 'static' because it allows us to check some parameters before we call the constructor method which is called inside this method.
        Parameters:
        pieceDescription - contains data to create a new object
        asteriskAccepted - if the asterisk ("*") can be accepted(true) or not(false)
        Returns:
        the piece created
        Throws:
        PieceConfigurationException - if any error occurs in the String received to create the piece

      • isEqualTo

        public boolean isEqualTo(Piece p)
        Checks if an input-given piece is equal to the current piece.
        Specified by:
        isEqualTo in interface I_piece
        Parameters:
        p - The piece you want to compare the current piece with
        Returns:
        true if they are equal, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Gets the object characteristics as String
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The object characteristic in String format

      • victory

        static boolean victory(Piece p0,
                       Piece p1,
                       Piece p2,
                       Piece p3)
        Checks if 4 input-given pieces have something in common
        Parameters:
        p0 - Piece #one
        p1 - Piece #two
        p2 - Piece #three
        p3 - Piece #four
        Returns:
        true if there are something in common, false otherwise
